localizart.msg_datos_incorrectos: Log in failed. Please check your details.

recupero_contrasena.msg_spam: We have sent an email to change your password. Check your spam folder if you do not find it.
recupero_contrasena.msg_caduco_link: Your request has expired. Please go to Forgot your password? again.
recupero_contrasena.msg_error_actualizacion: Sorry. We could not process it. Try again.
recupero_contrasena.msg_error_formato_password: Password must have at least 8 characters (both numbers and letters).
recupero_contrasena.msg_error_coinciden_password: Password must be the same you entered before.

adt.donde_esta_txt: It offers real time location shown on map (streets or avenue).
adt.donde_estuvo_txt: It offers historical location to know where have you been at any time.
adt.mis_lugares_txt: You can register your favourite places.
adt.mis_alertas_txt: You can receive mails when you enter or leave your favourite places.
